thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text: My first flight booking with FlightHub went perfectly. However, with my second booking, I was charged a mystery charge of about $20 that didn't make any sense. to FlightHub's credit, they refunded my with a few emails and their lack of being able to describe what the charge was for. Just be sure to watch for mystery charges. I do have a pending FlightHub-booked European trip coming up so we'll see how that goes - will keep a close eye out for mystery charges.
